item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 8, 2025 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Middle-aged man trading cards go viral in rural Japan town (1169 points | 277 comments)
2. No elephants: Breakthroughs in image generation (115 points | 60 comments)
3. Brazil's government-run payments system has become dominant (105 points | 104 comments)
4. Intelligence Evolved at Least Twice in Vertebrate Animals (36 points | 7 comments)
5. A wild 'freakosystem' has been born in Hawaii (38 points | 25 comments)
6. LLM-hacker-news: LLM plugin for pulling content from Hacker News (8 points | discuss)
7. Any program can be a GitHub Actions shell (194 points | 51 comments)
8. IBM Announces the Z17 Mainframe Powered by Telum II Processors (34 points | 11 comments)
9. Building the System/360 Mainframe Nearly Destroyed IBM (42 points | 10 comments)
10. Show HN: Browser MCP – Automate your browser using Cursor, Claude, VS Code (493 points | 182 comments)
11. Smallest Pacemaker Is the Size of a Rice Grain (71 points | 12 comments)
12. Less Htmx Is More (121 points | 74 comments)
13. Deleting multiplayer from the Unreal engine can save memory (95 points | 25 comments)
14. Neural Graffiti – Liquid Memory Layer for LLMs (38 points | 8 comments)
15. Paradigm (YC W24) Hiring Founding Engineers in SF ( | hide)
16. Show HN: Lux – A luxurious package manager for Lua (230 points | 83 comments)
17. Tom and Jerry One-Minute Video Generation with Test-Time Training (24 points | 1 comment)
18. India's repair culture gives new life to dead laptops (185 points | 108 comments)
19. Ancient Dagger Up to 2.5k Years Old W Stars/Moons/Geometric Patterns Unearthed (88 points | 21 comments)
20. Interviewing a software engineer who prepared with AI (233 points | 370 comments)
21. Unmasking EncryptHub: Help from ChatGPT and Opsec Blunders (42 points | 11 comments)
22. 'Exploding' Tunnock's teacakes cleared by tests to fly again (55 points | 23 comments)
23. What a refugee camp reveals about economics (12 points | 3 comments)
24. Arbitrage and equilibrium in the Team Fortress 2 economy (2012) (6 points | 2 comments)
25. Fifty Years of Open Source Software Supply Chain Security (147 points | 61 comments)
26. A Supermarket Bag and a Truckload of FOMO (85 points | 41 comments)
27. UK Effort to Keep Apple Encryption Fight Secret Is Blocked (128 points | 104 comments)
28. An Overwhelmingly Negative and Demoralizing Force (26 points | discuss)
29. Scaffold Level Editor (109 points | 23 comments)
30. Cloudflare Acquires Outerbase (9 points | discuss)
